Superior Inspiration: Has a minimum 1 Bardic Inspiration available after initiative

Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 5; B2: 3; B3: 3; B4: 3; B5: 3; B6: 2; B7: 2; B8: 1; B9: 1 Attack: B: 7; C: 8; D: 8; K: 7; P: 7; R: 8; S: 7; W: 5 Spell DC: B: 15; C: 16; D: 16; K: 15; P: 15; R: 16; S: 15; W: 13
Spells:
Bestow Curse (B3 Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to conc up to 10 min/8 hr/24 hr/permanent at level 4/5/7/9]
Calm Emotions (B2 Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses choice of charm and fright or hostility (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min
Charm Person (B1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Cloud Of Daggers (B2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Compulsion (B4 Ench): R30' Self controls target movement (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Confusion (B4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and move 60'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Dispel Magic (B3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Find The Path (B6 Divi): Self knows the shortest path to a specified destination for conc up to 1 dy
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains on Adv on Charisma w/non-hostile target for conc up to 1 min; target becomes hostile afterward
Healing Word (B1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+1 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +1 temporary HP each rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Monster (B5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes target creature (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Lesser Restoration (B2 Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Light (B0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Minor Illusion (B0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mislead (B5 Illu): Makes self invisible (attacking or casting ends) and creates an illusory duplicate that can move 60' and share senses for conc up to 1 hr
Polymorph (B4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg; shapechanger immune) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Sending (B3 Evoc): Self may exchange 25-word messages with a known target
Silent Image (B1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (B1 Ench): R30' Target ROFL (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains Adv on next attack on target w/in 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 B0 spells/May cast chosen B1 spell 1/long rest
Countercharm: R30' Performance gives friendly listeners Adv on saves vs. charm and fright for 1 rd
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Harmony: Produce minor elemental effects
Magical Secrets: May learn 6 additional spells from any class
Nimbus Of Pathos: Touched gains +4 AC, Adv on attack and saves, and +1d10 HP radiant damage and suffers crit on 18-20 for 1 min 1/long rest
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d12 HP after a short rest
